description: Try our easy to follow Stuffed Mushrooms recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stuffed vegetable,Christmas,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Stuffed Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove stalks from mushrooms, chop and set aside. Place mushroom cups into a lightly greased baking dish. Cook bacon, mushroom stalks, spring onions and capsicum in frying pan for 5 minutes over medium heat. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a bowl and cool.
Add egg and 1 cup of the cheese to cooled mixture. Spoon into mushroom cups. Combine remaining cheese and breadcrumbs and sprinkle over filling. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown.
